name: Capacity: One
description:
This game is submission to Game Zinga 10 Jam, the theme of the jam is one time use.

Your character can pick up guns or keys, but only one item at a time.

The items are for one use only, which means you only have one bullet per gun.

Both you and the enemies have one health.

Note: The game is still unfinished and sometimes doesn't work properly.
